title: #091 - Inspiration from Ariana Grande to Get Over Imposter Syndrome [REPLAY]
itunes:title: #091 - Inspiration from Ariana Grande to Get Over Imposter Syndrome [REPLAY]
description:
Due to Alex being sick, today’s solo episode is a replay of one of her favorite past episodes (Episode 037)!

Believe it or not, there was a time when I used to feel like the biggest fraud.
​​​​​​​
Today I’m an online business coach, but I first started my career as a photographer. I remember on my first few shoots I would show up full of nerves, wondering if I was worthy of being on the shoot, wondering if I’d know how to pose my client, or how to overcome the awkward silences. 
​​​​​​​
I look back now and know that I was suffering from something called ‘imposter syndrome’. When you’re first getting started with *anything* in life, it can be very common to feel this sense of unease, as though you haven’t fully proven yourself to be worthy of whatever it is that you’re doing.
​​​​​​​
Well today I’ve got some advice on Imposter Syndrome for you, all inspired by pop princess Ariana Grande.

In this episode, I chat about:

  • putting yourself out there without shame
  • embracing the new, awkward, clunky phase of your business
  • how to get people's attention before launching a new product
  • how to build upon momentum

​​​​​​​​I hope it inspires you as much as it did me.
